scripts.dev: npm run install-python-deps && node scripts/check-videos.js && next dev
scripts.build: npm run install-python-deps && node scripts/check-videos.js && next build
scripts.start: npm run install-python-deps && node scripts/check-videos.js && next start
scripts.install-python-deps: if [ "$OS" != "Windows_NT" ]; then chmod -R u+w data public/videos; else icacls data public\videos /grant %username%:F /T; fi && pip install moviepy transformers gtts requests torch psutil || pip3 install moviepy transformers gtts requests torch psutil
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Python dependencies installed automatically on npm run dev/build/start. Manual install: pip install moviepy transformers gtts requests torch psutil'
